item.title: Mentioned by BlackburnNews.com
item.description:
Provincial, Federal NDP Partnership Positive
MP for Windsor-Tecumseh Joe Comartin says he is looking forward to working with his new provincial counter-part. He's known MPP-elect Percy Hatfield since the days Hatfield was a political reporter. Comartin says a good working relationship could mean ...

item.title: Mentioned by Off Shore Gaming Assocation
item.description:
Single Game Sports Betting Opportunity Bolstered by Canadian Senator's Greed ...
Around 2 years ago Windsor-Tecumseh MP Joe Comartin introduced a private members bill to legalize single game sports betting. Comartin was concerned about the decline in attendance at Caesar's Windsor Casino after Detroit had opened 2 casinos of ...
